name: Quantum Labyrinth
description:
Quantum Labyrinth  is a persistent world for you to explore and make your own.  Use Magnetism to gather vast amounts of energy or just Zen out.  

    This game was made for Game Dev Field Guide's Monthly Game Jam in 3 weeks and is a combination of  my sister's love of Labyrinths and the game jam theme( the more there are the harder it is).  So Thankyou Amber and GDFG for all the inspiration and support. 

    This is my second time joining a jam and the first time ive  completed a game(besides bugs *)   Game Jams are the best way to rapidly increase your skills.

*Possible Bugs;

Mouse capture on game start: Every once in awhile the mouse will not work correctly  Alt-Tab out and then back into the program is a short fix.  

Game Saving and resetting:  Weird stuff might happen. not game breaking

I worked on this till the last minute but there are still a few glitches in the matrix. I  will work on them  asap.   

  AND   Thankyou.  You who would spend some time in this world I hope you enjoy.
